TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OracleBFile : System.IO.Stream, ICloneable, System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleBFile extends System.IO.Stream implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class OracleBFile Inherits Stream Implements ICloneable, INullable
public ref class OracleBFile sealed : System::IO::Stream, ICloneable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable

summary.span: 表示 Managed 物件，該物件是專為使用 Oracle 資料型別而設計的物件。

span.span: Represents a managed object designed to work with the Oracle data type.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Oracle`BFILE`資料型別是一種 Oracle`LOB`資料類型，包含最大值 4 gb 之二進位資料的參考。The Oracle `BFILE` data type is an Oracle `LOB` data type that contains a reference to binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes. Oracle`BFILE`不同於其他 Oracle`LOB`資料類型，其資料儲存在伺服器上的實體檔案而不是作業系統中。An Oracle `BFILE` differs from other Oracle `LOB` data types in that its data is stored in a physical file in the operating system instead of on the server. 請注意，`BFILE`資料類型提供唯讀資料存取。Note that the `BFILE` data type provides read-only access to data. 因此，寫入導向的方法繼承自不支援類別。Therefore, write-oriented methods inherited from the class are not supported. 其他特性`BFILE`資料型別有別於`LOB`資料類型包括：Other characteristics of a `BFILE` data type that distinguish it from a `LOB` data type are that it: - 包含非結構化資料。Contains unstructured data. - 支援伺服器端區塊。Supports server-side chunking. - 使用參考複製語意。Uses reference copy semantics. 例如，如果您在上執行複製作業`BFILE`，則只`BFILE`複製定位器 （其為檔案的參考）。For example, if you perform a copy operation on a `BFILE`, only the `BFILE` locator (which is a reference to the file) is copied. 而不會複製檔案中的資料。The data in the file is not copied. `BFILE`資料類型應該用於參照`LOB`s 大的大小，因此不適合儲存在資料庫中。The `BFILE` data type should be used for referencing `LOB`s that are large in size, and therefore, not practical to store in the database. 使用用戶端、 伺服器及通訊額外負荷`BFILE`資料型別相較於`LOB`資料型別。There is client, server, and communication overhead for using a `BFILE` data type compared to the `LOB` data type. 若要存取更有效率`BFILE`如果您只需要取得少量資料。It is more efficient to access a `BFILE` if you only need to obtain a small amount of data. 若要存取常駐的資料庫更有效率`LOB`s，如果您需要取得整個物件。It is more efficient to access database-resident `LOB`s if you need to obtain the entire object. 每個非 NULL物件都與定義基礎實體檔案的位置的兩個實體：Each non-NULL object is associated with two entities that define the location of the underlying physical file: - Oracle DIRECTORY 物件 (檔案系統中目錄的資料庫別名) 及An Oracle DIRECTORY object, which is a database alias for a directory in the file system, and - 基礎實體檔案的檔名 (位於與 DIRECTORY 物件相關聯的目錄中)。The file name of the underlying physical file, which is located in the directory associated with the DIRECTORY object. 之後`BFILE`已建立，您可以擷取其定位程式的形式物件使用或方法。After a `BFILE` is created, you can retrieve its locator in the form of an object using the or methods. 若要取得物件，呼叫方法。To obtain an object, call the method. 實體檔案的物件有關聯的不需要存在，直到您嘗試存取它。The physical file that an object is associated with does not need to exist until you attempt to access it. 應用程式可以繫結到不存在的檔案，建立實體檔案中預期的位置，並接著呼叫。An application can bind an to a nonexistent file, create the physical file in the expected location, and then call . 任何嘗試存取已關閉使用或方法再次開啟自動資料流。Any attempt to access a closed using the or methods reopens an stream automatically. 下列 C# 範例會示範如何建立`BFILE`在 Oracle 資料表，然後再將它擷取的形式物件。The following C# example demonstrates how you can create a `BFILE` in an Oracle table, and then retrieve it in the form of an object. 此範例示範如何使用物件和和方法。The example demonstrates the use of the object and the and methods. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleClient.BFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleClient.BFile/CS/source.cs#1)] 如需有關建立及使用 Oracle `BFILE`，請參閱 Oracle 文件中的適當主題。For more information about creating and using an Oracle `BFILE`, see the appropriate topic in your Oracle documentation. > [!NOTE] > `BeginWrite`， `EndWrite`，和`WriteByte`方法，都繼承自`System.IO.Stream`類別，因為不支援`BFILE`資料類型是唯讀的。The `BeginWrite`, `EndWrite`, and `WriteByte` methods, which are inherited from the `System.IO.Stream` class, are not supported because the `BFILE` data type is read-only.

summary.span: 會建立這個 物件的複本，這個複本與原始物件一樣都會關聯到相同的實體檔案。

span.span: Creates a copy of this object associated with the same physical file as the original.

returns.span: 新的 物件，它與原始 物件一樣都會關聯到相同的實體檔案。

span.span: A new object associated with the same physical file as the original object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的屬性物件一開始會有相同的值與原始物件。The properties of the new object initially have the same values as those of the original object. 不過之後,已完成，每個與其他物件無關。However, after the is complete, each object is independent from the other. 例如，變更值的原始屬性不會變更的值副本上。For example, changing the value of the property on the original does not change the value of on the copy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎資料類型的來源和目的地必須相容。The underlying data types of the source and the destination must be compatible. 比方說，您無法將二進位資料複製到目的地具有字元資料類型。For example, you cannot copy binary data to a destination that has a character data type. 您必須具有寫入存取權目的地如才能正確執行的作業。You must have write access to the destination for the operation to execute correctly.

summary.span: 表示沒有繫結到實體檔案的 null 物件。

span.span: Represents a null object that is not bound to a physical file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要在執行比對作業時很有用來決定 null 屬性。 can be useful when you want to perform a comparison operation on an to determine nullability. 任何嘗試執行讀取的作業物件成功，但不會傳回任何資料。Any attempt to perform a read operation on a object succeeds, but does not return any data. 任何嘗試執行寫入作業上物件產生例外狀況。Any attempt to perform a write operation on a object generates an exception. 選取`BFILE`包含 null 值的資料行會傳回。Selecting a `BFILE` column that contains a null value returns .

summary.span: 取得 資料流中目前的讀取位置。

span.span: Gets the current read position in the stream.
The current position within the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支援搜尋到的任何位置超出資料流的長度。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is not supported. `Position`屬性不會不追蹤的已耗用，略過，資料流，或兩者中的位元組數目。The `Position` property does not keep track of the number of bytes from the stream that have been consumed, skipped, or both.

exception.span: 嘗試使用負值或大於資料流長度的值設定位置。

span.span: Attempted to set a position with a negative value or greater than the length of the stream.

exception.span: 在關閉或處置資料流之後會呼叫方法。

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed or disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 位元組陣列。

span.span: An array of bytes.

param.span: 傳回這個方法時，緩衝區會包含指定的位元組陣列，其值介於 offset 和 (offset + count) 之間，並會由讀取自目前來源的位元組取代。

span.span: When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

param.name: offset
param.span: buffer 中以零為起始的位元組位移，即開始儲存讀取自目前資料流之資料的位置。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 自目前資料流讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.

summary.span: 自目前 讀取一位元組序列，並依所讀取的位元組數目進階資料流裡的位置。

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.

returns.span: 緩衝區所讀取的總位元組數。

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前無法取得足夠的位元組，則這個數目可能小於所要求的位元組數。如果已經到達資料流末端，則為零。

span.span: This may be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the file has been reached.

exception.span: 和 的總和大於緩衝區長度。

span.span: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.

exception.span: 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

exception.span: 或 為負。

span.span: or is negative.

exception.span: 相關聯的連接已經關閉。

span.span: The connection with which a is associated is closed.

exception.span: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

span.span: An I/O error occurred.

exception.span: 在關閉或處置資料流之後會呼叫方法。

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed or disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long Seek (long offset, System.IO.SeekOrigin origin);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 Seek(int64 offset, valuetype System.IO.SeekOrigin origin) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Seek (offset As Long, origin As SeekOrigin) As Long
public: override long Seek(long offset, System::IO::SeekOrigin origin);

param.name: offset
param.span: 相對於原點的位元組位移。

span.span: A byte offset relative to origin.

param.span: 如果 offset 為負數，則新的位置會在 origin 乘以 offset 之指定位元組數所指定的位置之前。

span.span: If offset is negative, the new position will precede the position specified by origin by the number of bytes specified by offset.

param.span: 如果 offset 為零，則新的位置會在 origin 所指定的位置。

span.span: If offset is zero, the new position will be the position specified by origin.

param.span: 如果 offset 為正數，則新的位置會在 origin 乘以 offset 之指定位元組數所指定的位置之後。

span.span: If offset is positive, the new position will follow the position specified by origin by the number of bytes specified by offset.

param.name: origin
param.span: 類型的值，表示用來取得新位置的參考點。

span.span: A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

summary.span: 設定目前 資料流上的位置。

span.span: Sets the position on the current stream.
The new position within the current stream.

exception.span: 嘗試使用負值或大於資料流長度的值設定位置。

span.span: Attempted to set a position with a negative value or greater than the length of the stream.

exception.span: 在關閉或處置資料流之後會呼叫方法。

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed or disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetFileName (string directory, string file);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetFileName(string directory, string file) cil managed
Public Sub SetFileName (directory As String, file As String)
public: void SetFileName(System::String ^ directory, System::String ^ file);

summary.span: 取得 型別的 ，其中含有 資料。

span.span: Gets an of type that contains the data.

value.span: 型別的 ，其中含有 資料。

span.span: An of type that contains the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性讀取整個`BFILE`一次。The property reads the entire `BFILE` at one time. > [!NOTE] > 使用的好處`BFILE`s 是擷取大量的資料區塊 （chunk） 的用戶端的能力。A benefit of using `BFILE`s is the ability to retrieve large amounts of data in chunks at the client. 不過，當您使用，您以一個連續的區塊，可能會大幅增加應用程式的額外負荷取得 BFILE 資料行的所有資料。However, when you use , you obtain all the data for the BFILE column as one contiguous chunk, which can significantly increase application overhead.
